Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Balaadhaanin Kumaaranaagiya Merodhaagpalaadhaan Ennum Baabilonin Raajaa, Esekkiyaa Vyaadhippattirundhu Aarokkiyamaanadhaik Kelvippattu Avanidaththirku Nirubangalaiyum Vegumaanaththaiyum Anuppinaan.

2 esekkiyaa Avargalaik Kandu Sandhoshappattu, Than Pokkishasaalaiyaiyum, Velliyaiyum, Ponnaiyum, Kandhavarkkangalaiyum, Nalla Parimalathailaththaiyum Than Aayudhasaalai Anaiththaiyum, Than Pokkishasaalaigalil Ulladhellaavatraiyum Avargalukkuk Kaanbiththaan; Esekkiyaa Than Aramanaiyilum, Than Raajyaththil Engum Avargalukkuk Kaanbiyaadhap Porul Ondrum Illai.

3 appozhudhu Esaayaa Theerkkadharisi Esekkiyaa Raajaavinidaththil Vandhu: Andha Manushar Enna Sonnaargal, Engeyirundhu Ummidaththil Vandhaargal Endru Kettaan. Adharku Esekkiyaa: Baabilon Ennum Dhooradhesaththilirundhu Ennidaththirku Vandhaargal Endraan.

4 appozhudhu Avan: Ummudaiya Veettil Ennaththaip Paarththaargal Endru Kettaan. Adharku Esekkiyaa En Veettilulladhellaavatraiyum Paarththaargal; En Pokkishangalil Naan Avargalukkuk Kaanbiyaadha Porul Ondrum Illai Endraan.
5 appozhudhu Esaayaa Esekkiyaavai Nokki: Senaigaludaiya Karththarin Vaarththaiyaik Kelum.
6 idho, Naatkal Varum; Appozhudhu Un Veettil Ulladhilum, Un Pidhaakkal Innaalvaraikkum Serththadhilum Ondrum Meedhiyaai Vaikkappadaamal Ellaam Baabilonukkuk Kondupogappadum.
7 nee Perappogira Un Sandhadhiyaagiya Un Kumaararilum Silar Baabilon Aramanaiyile Aramanai Velaikkaararaayiruppaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
8 appozhudhu Esekkiyaa Esaayaavai Nokki: Neer Sonna Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Nalladhudhaan Endru Solli, En Naatkalilaavadhu Samaadhaanamum Unmaiyum Irukkume Endraan.
